phrs.translation: 橄榄球场, 格状物, 格子工作台
热血橄榄队, 铁血雄心, 巨石强森
烤架俱乐部, 俱乐部

sentences.sentence: Joe Gibbs has returned to the Washington Redskins after 11 years away from the gridiron.
sentences.translation: 乔·吉伯斯在离开橄榄球场11年后重返华盛顿红人队。

sentences.sentence: In addition to his natural speed, quickness and strength, he could think his way around the court or gridiron.
sentences.translation: 除了他自然速度，敏捷度和力量，他可以认为他的方式靠近法院或格。
